channel.title: Arrays help
channel.description:
Could anyone help me learn how to use arrays?
like pointing me towards a tut? or talk with me learning me how to use them ?

item.title: Arrays help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

What type of array? Boolean, int, string, etc?

[code=java]
///Note: this is written in the comment box, and nothing is going to be “pretty” nor will the structure be correct…
public boolean[] oneDemArray = new boolean[3];//An single dimension array with 4 booleans.

public void makeAllTrue(){
for(int i = 0; i < oneDemArray.length-1; i++){ //Simple for loop to make all items in array true.
oneDemArray[i] = true;
}
if(oneDemArray[0]){//Check if first object in array is true.
String[] someString = {//Different type of array structure
“First Object”//This would be someString[0]
“Second Object”
};//Ending the array, remember, you need that semi-colon.
}//End of if statement.
System.out.println(“You now understand 1D arrays”);
}//End of method[/code]

Read full topic
